RelatedSentence: TRIPOLI , Libya -- Libya 's army chief ordered the deployment of Islamist - led militias to the capital Tripoli on Monday in response to the storming of parliament by forces loyal to a renegade general , paving the way for a possible showdown between rival militia fighters .
